abstract: Pres Barack Obama honors Super Bowl winners New England Patriots in ceremony on South Lawn of White House; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Obama honored the New England Patriots for winning their fourth Super Bowl in 14 years despite a “huge distraction” over underinflated footballs in their A.F.C. championship game.
snippet: Obama honored the New England Patriots for winning their fourth Super Bowl in 14 years despite a “huge distraction” over underinflated footballs in their A.F.C. championship game.
